heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy with periods of sunshine. Increasing chance of rain showers in the north, turning over to snow in the mountains. Highs from the mid-40s to near 50, increasing to the low to mid-50s in the southern valleys. Light northwest wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Increasing clearing overnight, clouds sticking around in the northeast. Chance of an isolated mountain rain or snow shower in the north. Patchy valley fog is developing before dawn. Lows from the upper 20s, mid 30s along Lake Champlain.

heading: Monday
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clouds developing from the north to the south. Highs from the mid to upper 40s, nearing 50 in the valleys.
